modName: No More Dragon Word Wall Blindness
summary: Removes dark screen when learning a Word of Power, or using certain enchantments/spells.
descriptionHtml:
If you play with realistic lighting mods, then you might know what I'm talking about: you go up to learn a Word of Power, and the screen, rather than simply darkening a bit, goes completely black so you can't see where you're going. Or, you'd use an Absorb Health/Magicka/Stamina enchantment or spell, and the same thing happened. Personally, I got tired of it, and thus this little tweak was born.

This mod removes the darkening effect of getting close to a new word wall. You still keep the double-vision, and you still get the ethereal, twisting lights coming from the word. The only thing "removed" was the darkening of the screen.

I could have simply reduced the darkening, but different lighting mods would require different levels of reduction, and there's enough of them out there that it's a daunting task, especially since people sometimes use more than one lighting mod.

Compatible with Skyrim v1.9.32.0
Dawnguard not required

This mod SHOULD be compatible with any and all versions of Skyrim, but has been tested and verified on the version mentioned above.

Changelog:
1.0 Original upload. Only learning Words of Power from walls affected
1.1 Added Absorbs spells/enchantments (Hopefully)
